title: coil
description: The description of a magnetic coil

oneOf.description: The name of the bobbin used in the core

functionalDescription.description: The data from the coil based on its function, in a way that can be used by analytical models of only Magnetism.
functionalDescription.title: coilFunctionalDescription

groupsDescription.description: The data from the coil at the gtoup level. A group may define a PCB, or different winding windows.

sectionsDescription.description: The data from the coil at the section level, in a way that can be used by more advanced analytical and finite element models

layersDescription.description: The data from the coil at the layer level, in a way that can be used by more advanced analytical and finite element models

turnsDescription.description: The data from the coil at the turn level, in a way that can be used by the most advanced analytical and finite element models

turn.description: Data describing one turn in a magnetic
turn.title: turn

winding.description: The name of the winding that this turn belongs to

parallel.description: The index of the parallel that this turn belongs to

layer.description: The name of the layer that this turn belongs to

section.description: The name of the section that this turn belongs to

orientation.description: Way in which the turn is wound
orientation.title: turnOrientation

length.description: The length of the turn, referred from the center of its cross section, in m

angle.description: The angle that the turn does, useful for partial turns, in degrees

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the rectangle defining the turn

rotation.description: Rotation of the rectangle defining the turn, in degrees

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the center of the turn, referred to the center of the main column

additionalCoordinates.description: List of additional coordinates of the center of the turn, referred to the center of the main column, in case the turn is not symmetrical, as in toroids

coordinateSystem.description: System in which dimension and coordinates are in
coordinateSystem.title: coordinateSystem

layer.description: Data describing one layer in a magnetic
layer.title: layer

section.description: The name of the section that this layer belongs to

orientation.description: Way in which the layer is oriented inside the section
orientation.title: windingOrientation

turnsAlignment.description: Way in which the turns are aligned inside the layer
turnsAlignment.title: coilAlignment

partialWindings.description: List of partial windings in this layer

insulationMaterial.description: In case of insulating layer, the material used

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the rectangle defining the layer

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the center of the layer, referred to the center of the main column

additionalCoordinates.description: List of additional coordinates of the center of the layer, referred to the center of the main column, in case the layer is not symmetrical, as in toroids

coordinateSystem.description: System in which dimension and coordinates are in
coordinateSystem.title: coordinateSystem

fillingFactor.description: How much space in this layer is used by wires compared to the total

windingStyle.description: Defines if the layer is wound by consecutive turns or parallels

group.description: Data describing one group in a magnetic, which can include several sections. Ideally this is used for PCB or different winding windows
group.title: group

sectionsOrientation.description: Way in which the sections are oriented inside the winding window
sectionsOrientation.title: windingOrientation

partialWindings.description: List of partial windings in this group

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the rectangle defining the group

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the center of the section, referred to the center of the main column

coordinateSystem.description: System in which dimension and coordinates are in
coordinateSystem.title: coordinateSystem

section.description: Data describing one section in a magnetic
section.title: section

layersOrientation.description: Way in which the layers are oriented inside the section
layersOrientation.title: windingOrientation

partialWindings.description: List of partial windings in this section

layersAlignment.description: Way in which the layers are aligned inside the section
layersAlignment.title: coilAlignment

dimensions.description: Dimensions of the rectangle defining the section

coordinates.description: The coordinates of the center of the section, referred to the center of the main column

coordinateSystem.description: System in which dimension and coordinates are in
coordinateSystem.title: coordinateSystem

fillingFactor.description: How much space in this section is used by wires compared to the total

windingStyle.description: Defines if the section is wound by consecutive turns or parallels

margin.description: Defines the distance in extremes of the section that is reserved to be filled with margin tape. It is an array os two elements from inner or top, to outer or bottom

group.description: The name of the group that this section belongs to

marginInfo.description: Data describing the information about the margin of a section
marginInfo.title: marginInfo

topOrLeftWidth.description: Width of the margin in the top or left side of the section, along where the clearance would happen. Also the width of the tape to implement it.

bottomOrRightWidth.description: Width of the margin in the bottom or right side of the section, along where the clearance would happen. Also the width of the tape to implement it.

insulationMaterial.description: In case of insulating layer, the material used

numberLayers.description: Number of layers to implement the margin

layerThickness.description: Thickness of the layers to implement the margin

partialWinding.description: Data describing one part of winding, described by a list with the proportion of each parallel in the winding that is contained here
partialWinding.title: partialWinding

winding.description: The name of the winding that this part belongs to

items.description: Proportion of turns that are contained in this part for the parallel in this index

connections.description: Array on two elements, representing the input and output connection for this partial winding

winding.description: Data describing one winding associated with a magnetic

connections.description: Array on elements, representing the all the pins this winding is connected to

woundWith.description: Lis of winding names that are wound together with this winding

connection.description: Data describing the connection of the a wire

metric.description: Metric of the terminal, if applicable

pinName.description: Name of the pin where it is connected, if applicable

direction.description: Direction of the current in the connection

length.description: Length of the connection, counted from the exit of the last turn until the terminal, in m
